scripts.jekyll: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd vite && APP_ENV=development vite dev" "cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o"
scripts.devwin: concurrently "cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=development vite dev" "cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o"
scripts.deploy: cd vite && APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets && mv dist/fonts fonts
scripts.build: cd vite && APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets && mv dist/fonts fonts && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
